scripts.dev: npm run compose:up && npm run migration:up && next dev
scripts.test: npm run compose:up && concurrently -n next,jest --hide next -k -s command-jest "next dev" "jest --runInBand"
scripts.test:watch: npm run compose:up && concurrently -n next,jest --hide next -k -s command-jest "next dev" "jest --watchAll --runInBand"
scripts.migration:up: npm run wait-for-postgres && node-pg-migrate -m infra/migrations --envPath .env.development up

hooks.pre-commit: npm run compose:down && npm run lint:prettier:check && npm run test
